Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were camping at my cousins property and he said the area was a hot bed for UFO activity since we not to far from Phoenix. We all looked up and started watching. Pretty soon we all saw a starlike object it moved from west to east at a pretty fast rate then stopped made a 90 degree angle move a little bit the another 90 degree angle and continued moving west. We also saw another one same type about 20 minutes later. It was moving the same way west to east. And it stopped started glowing and took off at amazing speed.
Summary: We were camping and saw something weird.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bullhead City
There were no other sightings in Bullhead City on or around October 8th 2011
